sql.name: queryXhMonthlyArList
sql.sqlString: select a.ADDITIONAL,/*帐外*/ a.AREA,/*省份*/ a.BANK_NAME,/*银行名称*/ a.BANK_NUMBER,/*银行账户*/ a.BANK_OPEN,/*银行开户行*/ a.BILL_DAY,/*账单日*/ a.CITY,/*地市*/ a.INTEREST,/*利息*/ a.LOAN_ID,/*借款人ID*/ a.LOAN_ID_CARD,/*借款人身份证号*/ a.LOAN_NAME,/*借款人名称*/ a.LOAN_NUMBER,/*借款人编号*/ a.LOAN_PRO,/*借款产品*/ a.LOAN_STATE,/*借款状态*/ a.MONEY,/*金额*/ a.SETTLEMENT_DATE,/*结算日期*/ a.SPARE_FIELD01,/*备用字段1*/ a.SPARE_FIELD02,/*备用字段2*/ a.SPARE_FIELD03,/*备用字段3*/ a.ID from XH_MONTHLY_AR a where 1=1 $sql
